entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
